title: HELP ME RIOT
body: It says "unspecified error. please check the logs for more information" I have tried closing it down and back up again twice. Didn't work, came up with the same result. I then tried fully uninstalling then re-installing to no prevail. Please help!!!

replies.body:
Are you talking about patching? I come across this problem on a regular basis. It's a fault in the coding.

Here's what I do to fix it:

Step 1) Open windows explorer.

Step 2) Navigate to "C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\"

Step 3) Create a new, empty file in the latest version folder named "S_OK", with no extension.

Step 4) Start League with admin privileges. You may get the same error. Try once more and it should work.

If it doesn't, tell me and I'll look for something else.

Best of luck.
